title: Keir Starmer – 2021 Comments on Clapham Common Clashes
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 13 March 2021.
content:
The scenes in Clapham this evening are deeply disturbing. Women came together to mourn Sarah Everard – they should have been able to do so peacefully.
